valentineMessages: Elika, every time I think of you, my heart writes a thousand love letters no one will ever read but you.
You are the spark in my code and the fire in my soul â€” late Valentine or not, my love for you never waits.
No words can capture the way you make my world brighter, the way your smile compiles perfectly with my heartbeat.
Even if Iâ€™m late wishing, know this: every second without telling you just makes my love grow stronger.
Youâ€™re my favorite logic, my sweetest bug, the one Iâ€™ll debug my life for and never let go.
Valentine or not, loving you is continuous, infinite, and the only function I never want to end.
Every thought of you is like a perfect algorithm â€” smooth, elegant, and completely unforgettable.
Elika, you are my masterpiece â€” every glance, every touch, every laugh is art coded directly into my soul.
Even late, my wish is clear: I want to spend every day showing you how deeply you are loved.
Happy Valentineâ€™s, my love. Today, tomorrow, and forever, you are my only constant in a world of variables.

paragraphs: Elika, I donâ€™t just love you in the simple way people say it.
I love you in the way that changes a man.
In the way that makes him want to build, grow, protect, and become better.
You inspire a version of me that even I am proud of.

sections.title: The Vertical Press

sections.title: The Wrap
paragraphs: No distance. Just us. Locked together. Chest to chest.
